I

Matt, 
) 
> wrote: 
With apologies: I now need to meet with a  witness starting at 4 today, so unfortunately 4:30 no longer works. 
Happy to talk between now and 4, or later this evening, if either works. Alternatively, I'm free at 9:30 
tomorrow morning, or between 11 a.m. and 1 p.m. tomorrow. 
Thanks, 
From:

perfect. Where should I  call?

EFTA00029730

I'm available for a call tomorrow either at 1  p.m. or anytime from 4:30 onwards, if either of those windows

Best, 
Sent from my iPhone 
On Oct 13, 2019, at 8:23 PM, Matthew L. Schwartz > wrote: 
Thanks . If any of you have a moment for a forfeiture-related question in the next few days, please let 
me know. FYI, this has nothing to do with my firm's representation of certain victims. Thanks. 
-mis 
Matthew L. Schwartz

wrote:

The Epstein case team are AUSAs and 
email. They're the right people to talk to about anything Epstein-related.

sensitive, but by no means urgent, Epstein-related forfeiture question in the next few days? 
Matthew L. Schwartz
